rules_text:
[i]Divine Pulse[/i] – At the beginning of each upkeep, remove all -1/-1 counters from Sothis.
[i]Look Ahead[/i] – You may look at the top card of your library at any time. During each of your turns, you may reveal the top card of your library if it is a land card. If you do, put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Persist
